item.title: Video Ad Spokesperson - Upwork
item.description:
Need an on camera talent to introduce our service (Volleyball Training Academy), intro and outro, the rest will be footage we will provide and edit.

Hourly Range: $50.00-$75.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 14:56 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Advertisement
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Advertisement
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
